radiographic_examinations.findings: Gallbladder remains edematous and markedly thick-walled with a large amount of intraluminal sludge. A small 1.5 cm zone of more clear anechoic bile is noted within the gallbladder lumen and the wall is hyper-vascular. The common duct at the level of the hilum measures approximately 9 mm. No distal calculi are identified.
